Smart Soap Dispenser: Develop a soap dispenser that can be controlled through a smartphone app. Users can set the amount of soap they want to dispense, and the dispenser will automatically dispense the exact amount. This is especially useful for people with who have difficulty measuring soap or for those who want to ensure they are using the right amount of soap.

Self-Cleaning Soap Dispenser: Create a soap dispenser that automatically cleans itself after each use. This can be done by using a self-cleaning mechanism that removes any soap residue from the dispenser. This is especially useful for people who are always on the go and don't have time to clean the dispenser manually.

Multi- Soap Dispenser: Develop a soap dispenser that can dispense multiple at once. This is especially useful for people who use different types of soap for different parts of their body, such as body wash, shampoo, and conditioner.

Soap Dispenser with Built-In Sensor: Create a soap dispenser that has a built-in sensor that detects the amount of soap left in the dispenser. When the soap runs out, the dispenser will automatically reorder more soap from a connected smartphone app.

Soap Dispenser with Built-In Showerhead: Develop a soap dispenser that has a built-in showerhead. This is especially useful for people who don't have a separate showerhead and want a convenient way to wash their hands or face. The showerhead can be adjusted to different water pressures and temperatures, making it easy to get the perfect wash.
